west-exit.desc: West edge of N-S street (exit to Southern District)

east-exit.desc: East edge where southern road meets legend boundary

road-west.desc: Main E-W road, western section (near N-S crossroad)

road-east.desc: Main E-W road, east section (near center N-S street)

road-far-east.desc: Main E-W road, far east (near N-S street at x=1100)

southern-road-west.desc: Southern E-W road, near Power Station #12

inn-front.desc: Street in front of Mos Eisley Inn (#8) on main E-W road

inn-door.desc: Mos Eisley Inn (#8) entrance — green tiled facade

inn-roof.desc: Mos Eisley Inn rooftop (Climbing 15, overlooks main road)

cantina-street.desc: Street outside the cantina area at the central plaza

cantina-door.desc: Cantina entrance (south face, off central plaza)

jabbas-townhouse-front.desc: Street near Jabba's Townhouse (#13) compound wall

jabbas-townhouse.desc: Jabba's Townhouse (#13) — large compound, heavily guarded

militia-front.desc: Street south of Tatooine Militia (#9) building

militia-building.desc: Tatooine Militia (#9) — large building, armed locals

govt-offices-front.desc: Street in front of Regional Government Offices (#11)

govt-offices.desc: Regional Government Offices (#11) — ornate decorative roof

power-station.desc: Power Station (#12) — electrical hazard, partial cover from machinery

preacher-corner.desc: Street Corner Preacher (#14) — ranting about doom, harmless distraction

dwelling-front.desc: Street in front of dwelling (southern road intersection)

dwelling.desc: Inside dwelling (occupied family, Moderate Persuasion for help)

shop-front.desc: Street in front of shop on southern road

shop.desc: Shop interior (rope, glow rods, ration packs -- 50 credits each)

tapcaf-front.desc: Street in front of tapcaf on western N-S street

tapcaf.desc: Tapcaf (cheap food, blue milk, locals gossip)

garage-front.desc: Street in front of garage (center-east N-S street)

speeder-1.desc: Parked speeder at central plaza (larger -- Moderate Mechanical 15, seats 4)

speeder-2.desc: Parked speeder on main road near eastern N-S street (smaller -- Easy Mechanical 10, seats 2, faster)

vaporator-plaza.desc: Behind vaporator at central plaza (partial cover)

vaporator-south.desc: Behind vaporator on southern road (partial cover)

rooftop-route-start.desc: Rooftop route start (above western buildings, Climbing 15 + Dex 15)

cover-crates-west.desc: Behind crates at western intersection (+1D cover)

cover-crates-east.desc: Behind crates at eastern intersection (+1D cover)

side-alley.desc: Narrow alley between buildings — tight, only 2 people wide. Ambush territory. Recessed doorway provides hiding (+1D Sneak).

bay-94-entrance.desc: Docking Bay 94 entrance — Imperial impound, 4 Stormtroopers posted. Seized freighter with engine clamps (Mechanical 25 to remove). Ship theft: Very Difficult, triggers immediate alert.

bay-86-entrance.desc: Docking Bay 86 entrance — smuggler's YT-2000 being loaded by 2 Rodian crew. Hostile but bribable (500 credits or Moderate Persuasion 15). Rodians fight back, ship needs their Astrogation codes.

bay-87-entrance.desc: Docking Bay 87 entrance — sign reads 'BAY 87' above the blast door. The Rodian said sunset. The Rusty Mynock (YT-1300) waits inside, needs Repair 15.

bay-92-entrance.desc: Docking Bay 92 entrance — empty bay, a maintenance droid (MSE-6) sweeps the floor. No ship. Safe to explore but a dead end — sunset is approaching.

sign-docking-bays.desc: Directional sign: 'DOCKING BAYS 86-94 →' pointing west (Aurebesh + Basic). Arrow points toward the upper-left bay complex.

npc-dockworker.desc: Ithorian dockworker leaning on a cargo loader. Gives Bay 87 directions for 10 credits or Easy Persuasion 10: 'Bay 87? Third door on the left past the impound yard. Watch out for the troopers at Bay 94.'

sign-bay-87.desc: Sign above blast door: 'BAY 87' in faded Aurebesh. Below it in Basic: 'Authorized Personnel Only'. The blast door is unlocked.

market-stalls.desc: Open-air market stalls (Jawa traders selling scrap electronics, food vendor with skewered meats and blue milk, cloth merchant with cloaks — 30 credits for a disguise)

checkpoint-bay.desc: Imperial checkpoint on road approach to docking bays (2 Stormtroopers, scanner equipment, barricade). Moderate Con 15 to bluff past, or sneak through alleys.

obstacles.desc: North-west building block (north of main road, west of first N-S street)
North center-west building block (between N-S streets, south of upper road)
North center building block (between center N-S streets)
North center-east building block (includes #8 Inn, #9 Militia area buildings)
North-east building block (includes #10 Dewback Stables, #11 Gov Offices)
South center-west building cluster (includes #13 Jabba's Townhouse area)
Southern building block (south of southern road)

main-road.desc: Main east-west road at y~400 -- open and exposed, occasional patrol

upper-road.desc: Upper east-west road at y~110 -- less trafficked, connects north buildings

southern-road.desc: Southern east-west road at y~640 -- residential area, near Power Station

ns-streets.desc: North-south cross streets connecting the three E-W roads

weg-landmarks.desc: WEG numbered locations from Tatooine Manhunt -- key buildings

cantina-area.desc: Area near the cantina at the central plaza -- familiar territory

buildings-north.desc: Named buildings on the north side of the main road

buildings-south.desc: Buildings on the south side of the main road and southern areas

vehicles.desc: Parked speeders along the main road

rooftops.desc: Rooftop route across the north block (Climbing 15 + Dex 15 to jump between)

cover.desc: Positions offering partial cover from obstacles and structures

docking-bays.desc: Docking bay entrances in the upper-left bay complex and southeast. Bay 87 is the destination!

wayfinding.desc: Signs and NPCs that help the party find Bay 87

market.desc: Open-air market stalls on the southern road — crowded, good cover for sneaking (+1D Sneak)
